channel.title: FizzerX-Scape ~ 317 [ALLSTAR] ~
channel.description:
[URL=http://imgur.com/Fkm4AwG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fkm4AwG.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imgur.com/JCC02p3][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JCC02p3.png[/img][/URL] DEDICATED STAFF TEAM [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Mod Cody - Development Mod ReaperX - Development xX4m4zingXx - Webclient Developer[/shadow][/size] **FizzerX Staff are always trying to make FizzerX-Scape a better game. We are always trying to help our players the best we can. We have a great Staff Team always at work.** Quote from ReaperXScape
every time i play it, it gets improved this server is nice, cant wait to see how far it is with-in 1-4 months, it will be great. i dont know why people hate hamachi, its totally worth the download
Future Plans: -Pest Control -[b]Dungeoneering - COMPLETED!![/b] :D -Better PK System/PvP -Better Prayer -Better Barrows -Fix duel arena (better Staking system) -Make more quests -Clan Chat with Loot Share -Boxing Ring Please comment and tell me what you think about FizzerX-Scape. NEWEST UPDATES: 5/20/13 = 2:29 PM *XP LAMPS GIVE 500K EXP * *Instead of fast leveling up, exp. rates are 10 (you hit 30 = 300 xp, you hit 3 = 30 xp, etc) * *PK Points add up and give you items * *********************************************************************** Pictures: Dungeoneering!!! [URL=http://imgur.com/5Z5n7AF][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5Z5n7AF.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imgur.com/1uxQdvK][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1uxQdvK.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://imgur.com/x3ZB78c][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x3ZB78c.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imgur.com/iOo8vMv][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iOo8vMv.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imgur.com/LsWVeZk][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LsWVeZk.png[/img][/URL] Home [URL=http://imgur.com/kecSC1R][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kecSC1R.png[/img][/URL] Dagg. Cave [URL=http://imgur.com/AbvMKyH][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AbvMKyH.png[/img][/URL] Yell Titles [URL=http://imgur.com/5lP8QuL][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5lP8QuL.png[/img][/URL] Raffle And PK Scoreboard [URL=http://imgur.com/o0zc1XY][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o0zc1XY.png[/img][/URL] Super Rares [URL=http://imgur.com/w2bebjy][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w2bebjy.png[/img][/URL] Pest Control [URL=http://imgur.com/PqJbJFd][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PqJbJFd.png[/img][/URL] New Veng Animations [URL=http://imgur.com/VeMkhSP][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VeMkhSP.png[/img][/URL] Donator Shop [URL=http://imgur.com/12NRrTd][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/12NRrTd.png[/img][/URL] Bandos - FULLY WORKING GODWARS DUNGEON COMING SOON! [URL=http://imgur.com/tTfq8Oz][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tTfq8Oz.png[/img][/URL] Hunter [URL=http://imgur.com/UQK48O6][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UQK48O6.png[/img][/URL] Staff List / Quest Tab [URL=http://imgur.com/qiHoQVT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qiHoQVT.png[/img][/URL] PK Armor [URL=http://imgur.com/sgrxmPq][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sgrxmPq.png[/img][/URL] Join today to find out what FizzerX-Scape is really all about! *We need more staff and testers.*

item.title: FizzerX-Scape ~ 317 [ALLSTAR] ~
item.dc:creator: @shaun123430 shaun123430
item.description:
@shaun123430 wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:7, topic:519423”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=637886.msg4299835#msg4299835 date=1368809011]

so you guys stopping reaperscape?

and is this still allstar?

We are working on both, ReaperXScape and FizzerX-Scape. They are both Allstar sources.

No offence but beside of yell titles i dont really see coding :/, good luck
[/quote]and what’s hard about yell titles…if you can follow a delta tutorial on them you can add them into allstar quite easily…

I have not added a lot of pictures. That is why you might think I didn’t code a lot. I have been doing a LOT of coding. I have done a lot, adding quests, making dungeoneering, making customs for the game, etc. You will see when I have it done. And I didn’t follow a tutorial for Delta to make the Yell Titles.[/quote]

If you manage to add some more features to this then I might try it out. Looks like it could be good, if done right. I used to love playing all-star servers, but now most of them are just leeched with nothing special added.

Read full topic
